name: Islander95
description:
Thank you for purchasing Islander95™!  The only Software Package™ that will give YOU, the customer, the FULL patented Island Generation™ experience.

You might be wondering, "What does this whacky Software Package™ even do???" And that my good sir is a great question! 

Islander 95 is a cute little desktop toy I made for a university assignment. From the name (and whatever the hell that intro was) you can probably guess what it does, It procedurally generates little islands for you! 

Each island comes with a seed, but the seed only controls the name of the island and the shape. You can hit seed lock and regenerate to remake the features of an island!

When you find a really cool island, you can hit the export button to save a screenshot of it straight to your downloads folder. You can either save it as a normal screenshot or as a postcard! (the postcard also has the name of the island on it)

If you come across some nice islands, feel free to share them in the comments or on social media!

And hey, thanks for playing! I know a lot of people won't see this but I really appreciate everyone who takes time out of their day to look at some funky ass islands.
